fields.text:
Muulize mteja alijionaje ulipo mpatia rufaa ya kwenda kupatiwa njia ya uzazi wa mpango.

Jadili na mteja kujua alihudumiwa vipi kituoni, vibaya au vizuri na kwanini?.

Mwambie mteja utamuuliza maswali machache kujua hali ya huduma aliyopatiwa wakati alipotaka kukamilisha rufaa.

Msisitize mteja kuwa taarifa hizi zitakuwa za siri na zitasaidia kuboresha huduma kwenye vituo vya kutolea huduma za afya.

Mwambie mteja kwamba tunaweza kuboresha huduma kama tutapata majibu ya ukweli kutoka kwa uzoefu wa huduma wanazopatiwa wateja hata kama walihudumiwa vibaya.

Msisite mteja kuwa wazi na mkweli wakati nanajibu maswali

fields.label: Muulize:Je upo tayari kujibu maswali haya?

step3.title: Kituo Cha kutolea Huduma za Afya kilipo kilichotembelewa

v_required.err: Tafadhali jaza jina la Kituo cha kutolea Huduma ulichotembelea

fields.hint: Jina na mahali Kituo cha kutolea Huduma za Afya kilipo

fields.label: Makazi
Elimu
Kazi
Hali yako ya ndoa
Dini
What do you think are the reasons that people do not go to health facilities for family planning services?
How do you get to your facility of choice?
How much time does it take to reach the health facility that is closest to your household?
Is this the nearest health facility from your home?
Why did you decide to come to this facility and not the nearest one?

options.text: I didn't need family planning services
It is expensive in the other facility

fields.label: Was the facility open when you arrived?
Did you arrive during normal operating hours at the health facility?
Did you get family planning information at the reception?
How long did it take you to be attended by the service provider?
Did the service providers make you feel welcome?
Did the service provider assure you of confidentiality?
Did you meet the service providers in a private room?
Did the service provider provide you with clear information about various family planning services and methods?
Did the service providers use visual aids to demonstrate family planning methods to you?
Did the service provider ask if you had any concerns about previously used methods?
Were you given information on dual protection (Preventing both HIV/STIs and pregnancy)?
Muulize:Je ni aina ngapi zanjia za uzazi wa mpango unaweza kutaja? Weka tiki kwenye kila njia mtejaalizoweza kutaja.
Have you ever gone to this health facility for family planning services, but not received the services you needed?
Why did you not get services at the health facility?

options.text: The method was out of stock

fields.label: How many times have you missed the service/method you went for because a skilled provider was not present?
Did you pay for the service or method you got?
What were the costs for?
Were you asked to give some kickbacks to get the service?

fields.hint: How much did you pay? (in Tsh)

fields.label: Have you had a problem with the family planning services in the health facility since I saw you last?
What type of problem was it? Choose all that apply

options.text: Method of your choice not available

fields.label: Did you file a complaint?
Why didnt you file a complaint?

options.text: Did not think anything would be done
Did not know where to complain

fields.label: Was your problem solved to your satisfaction?
How long did it take to have your problem addressed?
Je uliripoti tena malalamiko?
Je utarudi tena kituoni kupata huduma za uzazi wa mpango?
Je umeridhika na huduma ya uzazi wa mpango kwa ujumla?
Are you satisfied with family planning services I am providing you by using the mobile phone?
As compared to the first time you visited the health facility, have family planning services improved?
